title: What it's like in Europe's popular crypto haven Portugal as the U.S. cracks down
description: Quality of life, bitcoin-friendly tax laws and a huge influx of expats have made Lisbon one of the crypto capitals of the world.

title: Meta's VR technology is helping to train surgeons and treat patients, though costs remain a hurdle
description: Virtual reality technology from Meta and other companies is finding its way into hospitals and medical schools even as it struggles to find consumer traction.

title: Indian PM Modi says a consensus has been reached on a G20 declaration
description: There were fears Delhi negotiators and diplomats might not be able to broker a consensus at this year's meeting due to Russian and Chinese objections on the reference to the ongoing war.

title: G20 welcomes African Union as permanent member at Delhi leaders' summit
description: The widely-anticipated move underscores India's wide-ranging agenda to elevate the global multilateral forum's focus on the Global South in its presidency of the G20 this year.
